channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Solar Surge: Why First Solar, Inc. (FSLR) is Heating Up in a Cooling Market

item.title: Investors should stay away from risk right now after Trump's tariff announcement, says Citi's Kate Moore
item.description: Moore's comments come after President Donald Trump signed a tariff plan that imposes steep levies on many countries.

item.title: JPMorgan slashes bank sector estimates, downgrades U.S. Bancorp on economic impact from tariffs
item.description: Analyst Vivek Juneja cut his earnings estimates for U.S. banks, and warned "there is potential for further cuts" due to tariff changes Wednesday.

item.title: HSBC downgrades Nvidia, sees 'limited room' for any upside despite recent drop
item.description: HSBC sees limited upside potential ahead for artificial intelligence darling Nvidia.

item.title: Two retailers could end up beneficiaries of tariffs, says Citi in upgrade
item.description: Citi analyst Paul Lejeuz upgraded shares of both TJX Companies and Ross Stores to a buy rating from neutral.

item.title: What value investor Bill Nygren is scooping up during the market rout
item.description: Bill Nygren says the market turmoil brought on by the Trump administration's aggressive tariffs creates an 'unusual' opportunity for bargain-hunting.
